short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tiny extension that appends 'opinion disclaimer' at the end of each Reddit comment

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reddop is a Chrome extension that appends a short disclaimer at the end of each comment: "Disclaimer: This is my own personal opinion."

The purpose of the disclaimer is to keep reminding reddit users to take each comment with a grain of salt as it becomes easy to forget that each comment was written by another human being with flaws and biases.

Reddop therefore acts as a reality-checker that reminds users not to take any comment for granted and to stay critical while reading the opinions of other people online.
